angle: 150
site: distill::distill_website
links:
  - label: '`r fontawesome::fa("envelope")`    Email'
    url: "stachele@usc.edu"
  - label: '`r fontawesome::fa("twitter")` Twitter'
    url: "https://twitter.com/stchlk"
  - label: '`r fontawesome::fa("github")` Github'
    url: "https://github.com/whtns"
  - label: '`r fontawesome::fa("graduation-cap")` Scholar'

---
 
```{r, include=FALSE, results='asis'}
library(metathis)

meta() %>%
  meta_social(
    title = "Kevin Stachelek Personal Website",
    description = "Kevin Stachelek's research portfolio",
    url = "http://stchlk.rbind.io/",
    image = "images/olympus.jpg",
    image_alt = "Mount Olympus, WA",
    og_type = "website",
    og_author = "Kevin Stachelek",
    twitter_card_type = "summary",
    twitter_creator = "@stchlk"
  )

```
